input.sentences: a group of adults gathered at a room to listen to readers tell stories .
the room was mostly dark except for a spotlight shining on the stage .
at the stage stood the readers with a piece of paper and a microphone on a stand .
the readers told their stories with energy and focus .
a couple who attended the readings were very pleased with their experience .
output.sentences: They sat at tables for the first speech.
A man came out to speak next.
He read from a piece of paper as the crowd listened.
He paid more attention to the paper than he did to the crowd.
The couple smiled when his speech was over.
